originalText.text: I've had an excellent experience with Kendall so far. She is an extremely caring and empathetic therapist who has helped me through many challenges with her considerate and deliberative approach. I look forward to each of my sessions with her. Highly recommend!

text.text: I've had an excellent experience with Kendall so far. She is an extremely caring and empathetic therapist who has helped me through many challenges with her considerate and deliberative approach. I look forward to each of my sessions with her. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Jillian Kaufman has been a trusted peer and colleague for the past several years, and I highly and wholeheartedly recommend her clinical services to anyone looking for expert mental health care.  Dr. Kaufman is kind, patient, and compassionate with an ability to also communicate directly, without bias or judgment, the hard truths we all sometimes need to hear.  Dr. Kaufman will be sure you and/or your loved one are cared for in a space of emotional safety, with room and guidance for personal love, growth, and exploration.

text.text: Dr. Jillian Kaufman has been a trusted peer and colleague for the past several years, and I highly and wholeheartedly recommend her clinical services to anyone looking for expert mental health care. originalText.text: Dr. Kaufman is acutely aware of the complexity of the human experience, steeped in curiosity and openness to learn her clients’ narratives. She is a trusted colleague and friend, a talented clinician, and a supportive supervisor who has made Wavelength Psychotherapy a nurturing environment for her staff.

She is a trusted colleague and friend, a talented clinician, and a supportive supervisor who has made Wavelength Psychotherapy a nurturing environment for her staff.

originalText.text: I have been at Wavelength Psychotherapy for quite awhile, and I highly recommend Kendall. She has helped me through hard times in an empathetic, caring way and I am so grateful for the work we’ve done together. Highly recommend!

text.text: I have been at Wavelength Psychotherapy for quite awhile, and I highly recommend Kendall. She has helped me through hard times in an empathetic, caring way and I am so grateful for the work we’ve done together. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Wavelength Psychotherapy has been nothing short of amazing. Everyone I have met so far has been so welcoming and understanding. I have never felt judged for things I share and I never feel as though I am not an equal during my sessions. If you are on the fence or worried about starting therapy Wavelength will make you feel comfortable and not alone in your journey!
